message.name: ERR_XFV_PLANTEMPLATESUBGOAL_PLAN_ITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: This plan item has already been assigned to the plan template sub goal and cannot be assigned again.

message.name: ERR_FV_PLAN_ITEM_BLANK
message.locale: The plan item must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_DURATION_LE_ZERO
message.locale: The duration must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_LT_ZERO
message.locale: The number of days after the commenced start date of plan that the planned item starts must not be less than zero.

message.name: ERR_PT_PLAN_ITEM_ADD_TO_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template plan item cannot be assigned to a canceled plan template.
The plan template plan item cannot be assigned to a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_PLAN_ITEM_DELETE_FROM_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template plan item cannot be deleted from a canceled plan template.
The plan template plan item cannot be deleted from a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_MAXIMUM_UNITS
message.locale: The Authorized Units cannot be greater than the Maximum Units.
The Authorised Units cannot be greater than the Maximum Units.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_MAXIMUM_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_PLAN_ITEM_MAXIMUM_UNITS
message.locale: The Maximum Units cannot be greater than Maximum Units for this Plan Item.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_PLAN_ITEM_AUTHORIZED_UNITS
message.locale: The Authorized Units cannot be greater than Authorized Units for this Plan Item.
The Authorised Units cannot be greater than Authorised Units for this Plan Item.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_ENTERED_NO_UNIT_TYPE
message.locale: Authorized Units cannot be entered as a Unit Type was not selected for this Plan Item.
Authorised Units cannot be entered as a Unit Type was not selected for this Plan Item.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_PLAN_ITEM_XFV_MAXIMUM_UNITS_ENTERED_NO_UNIT_TYPE
message.locale: Maximum Units cannot be entered as a Unit Type was not selected for this Plan Item.

message.name: ERR_FV_AUTHORIZED_UNITS_LE_ZERO
message.locale: Authorized Units must be greater than zero.
Authorised Units must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_FV_MAXIMUM_UNITS_LE_ZERO
message.locale: Maximum Units must be greater than zero.
